iiv.gui

Class CNURowLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.gui.CNURowLayoutManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, java.awt.LayoutManager2

    public class CNURowLayoutManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager2
    This is a basic display container window for iiV.
    Since:
    iiV1.0
    See Also:
    CNUViewer, Container

      • getLayoutState

        public java.lang.Object getLayoutState(java.awt.Container cont)
        Gets an object that stores private info about the internal state of this layout manager. This can be used to reset the state after an add or remove has been preformed. Specifically designed to allow a container to perform undo/redo since this manager component positioning depends on the previous history of adds.
        Parameters:
        cont - non-null container using this layout
        Returns:
        object describing the internal state of the layout manager

      • setLayoutState

        public void setLayoutState(java.lang.Object obj,
                           java.awt.Container cont)
        Sets the internal state of the manager from an object that was generated by this layout manager. If the object is the wrong type or null the internal state is reset to its initial.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object previously retrieved using getLayoutState
        cont - non-null container using this layout

      • resetLayout

        public void resetLayout(int newNextx,
                        int newNexty,
                        int newNextCol,
                        int newRowBottom,
                        java.awt.Container cont)
        Sets the next layout position to a given location, the next column to a given column and the current row bottom to a given position.
        Parameters:
        newNextx - x pixel position to place left edge of next component
        newNexty - y pixel position to place top edge of next component
        newNextCol - column number next component will be positioned at negative values cause reset of all layout positions to defaults during layout
        newRowBottom - y pixel location of bottom edge of row
        cont - non-null container using this layout
